title: Wholemeal fruit cake
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) self raising flour', '110g (4 oz) wholemeal flour', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt', '110g (4 oz) butter', '170g (6 oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '5 tablespoons milk', '340g (12 oz) mixed dried fruit']
